document.full_text: luis salazar, a manager in the braves' minor league system, lost an eye in a spring training accident but made a speedy recovery and is back in the dugout.
document.title: on baseball: a manager turns misfortune into a lesson
lines_and_colors: luis salazar, a manager in the braves' minor league system, lost an eye in a spring training accident but made a speedy recovery and is back in the dugout.
